overview: How blue can you be? Director Scotty Fox pushes the limits of erotica to new boundaries in Behind Blue Eyes #3 to find out. Set in the Italian restaurant, you'll see dishes on the menu you won't find at any other eating establishment. When the cuisine is served, the patrons lick a lot more than just fingers. Hungry yet? See Behind Blue Eyes #3. Betcha can't watch it just once!
tagline: Take Extreme Pleasure and multiply it by ten
title: Behind Blue Eyes 3
